tool_description: Generates monitoring dashboards and visualizations for container metrics, health status, and performance data with customizable layouts and chart types.

data_sources.description: Data sources to include: metrics, logs, health_checks, alerts, performance

chart_types.description: Chart types to generate: line, bar, pie, gauge, heatmap, table

layout.description: Dashboard layout: grid, vertical, horizontal, custom

include_filters.description: Include interactive filters for namespaces, containers

error_messages: Invalid data sources: Use only [metrics, logs, health_checks, alerts, performance].
Invalid chart types: Use only [line, bar, pie, gauge, heatmap, table].
Invalid time range: Use one of [1h, 6h, 24h, 7d, 30d].
Invalid refresh interval: Must be between 10-3600 seconds.
Invalid layout: Use one of [grid, vertical, horizontal, custom].
Dashboard generation failed: Unable to generate dashboard due to configuration errors.
usage: Specify dashboard_name, data_sources, and chart_types, optionally configure time_range, refresh settings, and layout preferences.

dashboard_id.description: Unique identifier for the generated dashboard

dashboard_url.description: URL to access the generated dashboard

widget_count.description: Number of widgets created in the dashboard

generation_status.description: Dashboard generation status: success, partial, failed
